name: Varan
description:
You are lost in the desert. Or in a forest. You can't understand. Suddenly, you notice a wild varan hiding in the sands that wants to kill you and eat you. You startle and run, but the vile animal starts to chase you...

Man vs. beast. Who will win this battle - the human or the reptile?

This is a very short game. You can complete it in a few seconds.

P.S. I saw it in my dream in 2018.

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

  1. Unpack the varan.zip
  2. Run varan.exe
